website.name: AtYourDoorStep
website.description: Premium doorstep delivery service for authentic Ratnagiri Alphonso mangoes, pure cold-pressed oils, and organic jaggery from trusted Indian farmers.

story.summary: We began over 30 years ago with a small, traditional jaggery unit near sugarcane fields — built on values of purity, tradition, and hard work.
story.mission: To bring honest, chemical-free, and high-quality products into Indian households, while making the process as easy and accessible as possible.
story.vision: AtYourDoorstep is more than just a brand — it's a promise of purity with convenience, rooted in Indian traditions and powered by modern delivery.
story.founding_principle: Chemical-free, traditional methods, direct from farm to home

jaggery_warehouse.process: Traditional iron pan boiling over firewood

cold_pressing_unit.principle: No heat, no chemicals, nutrients intact

alphonso_mangoes.name: Ratnagiri Alphonso Mangoes
alphonso_mangoes.description: Authentic king of mangoes from Ratnagiri with unmatched sweetness and aroma
alphonso_mangoes.quality_assurance: No chemicals, no shortcuts, naturally ripened

cold_pressed_oils.name: Pure Cold-Pressed Oils
cold_pressed_oils.description: 100% pure cold-pressed oils extracted using traditional methods

organic_jaggery.name: Organic Jaggery
organic_jaggery.description: Pure organic jaggery - natural sweetener from traditional sources
organic_jaggery.process: Traditional iron pan boiling over firewood

customer_support.description: Dedicated customer support for all queries

value_propositions.authenticity: Direct sourcing from authentic locations like Ratnagiri
value_propositions.quality: Premium quality assurance and customer satisfaction
value_propositions.transparency: No middlemen, direct farm to home delivery
